Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.tab

C-JDBC text and graphical consoles.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AuthenticationTab This tab has al the fields for the authentication section of the virtual database.
BackendTab This tab has the required field to define backend information and their related connection managers
CachingTab This tab defines the fields to fill for caching.
DistributionTab Distribution tab has the fields for distributed virtual database.
RecoveryTab The recovery tab has the fields needed to define a RecoveryLog This tab can be extended later to use for other recovery log types.
RequestManagerTab RequestManager is the main panel for the information regarding the request manager.
VirtualDatabaseTab This is the general panel for the configuration of the virtual database.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.tab Description

C-JDBC text and graphical consoles.
